title: Harris has no business in law
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

If there weren’t yet enough reason to nullify all the convictions of the marijuana-smoking district attorney from San Francisco, Kamala Harris, after her appearance on National Public Radio’s “Morning Edition” her license to practice law mut be in jeopardy (“Kamala Harris: I wouldn’t say there’s no evidence of new Kavanaugh allegations,” Web, Sept. 16).

Ms. Harris said, “The fact that someone does not remember the details of that incident doesn’t mean that there’s a lack of evidence if there are other witnesses who can establish that the fact occurred.” Clearly Ms. Harris he has no scruples and will do or say anything.

I hope some defense attorneys and the California Republican Party are preparing their complaint before the state bar. And I bet “Sleepy Joe” isn’t dozing anymore.

JOHN GALL

Arlington, Va.
